title: When Amumu lands Bandage Toss on me

replies.body: Why are you not squeezing back?
... Guys, this conversation is getting awkward.
Is that a {{item:1038}}  in your pocket, or are you happy to see me?

But then you remember to cleanse.
http://67.media.tumblr.com/96664f9fee7becba7867ced17d1dcfc4/tumblr_nj41e6m0QU1u6nxlno3_500.gif
